Sonnie Ayere bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na Naijiria, onye isi ọrụ nke Dunn Loren Merrifield Group, na onye isi oche nke Association of Issuing Houses of Nigeria (AIHN). N'afọ 2020, e nyere ya onyinye dị ka onye isi ụlọ akụ na ụba nke afọ iri site n'aka ụlọ akụ na ụlọ ọrụ ego ndị ọzọ (BAFI) Awards na 2020 ECOWAS Icon of Societal Development site n'aka The West Africa Youth Council maka ọrụ enyemaka ya.
Ayere gụrụ Financial Economics na Mahadum Dundee, Scotland na 1993 ma nwetakwa MBA na Cass Business School, London.

Ọ malitere ọrụ akụ na ụba ya dị ka Structured Finance Specialist for Sub-Saharan Africa n'afọ 2002 wee sonye na UBA Group Plc n'agbata afọ 2005 na afọ 2009 dị ka onye nduzi nke ụlọ akụ na ụba mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru Tony Elumelu tupu ọ malite ịmepụta Dunn Loren Merrifield n'afọ 2009 (DLM), ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego na Nigeria nke meriri Best Investment Company na Nigeria na 2014 World Finance Banking Awards na 2020 Banks’ and Financial Institutions (BAFI) Awards dị ka Most Innovative Investment Bank of the Year Award.

Nakwa n'afọ 2012, a họpụtara Ayere dị ka onye isi nchịkwa nke Nigeria Mortgage Refinance Company (NMRC) ma tinye ya na The Chartered Institute of Public Resources Management and Politics (CIPRMP) 2020 Fellowship Hall of Fame.
